Press, 1998), viii + 828 pp. Converted into web usable data in May 2009 by Dr. Marvin Bolt and Steven Lucy, working at the Webster Institute of the Adler Planetarium.

abstract.p: Considering character of Lord A. [Aberdeen?], JH and wife believe that any letter on behalf of James [C. Stewart?] should come to Lord A. from Sir J. Graham or another public figure and should describe recent events with Lord Derby. Comments on examination system in India.
